attributes.action: LIVE ON JSA OR INCOME SUPPORT FOR A FORTNIGHT!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MY PETITON IS TO SHOW TONY BLAIR HOW HARD IT IS FOR SOMEONE ON BENEFITS AND THAT WEE ARE NOT ALL LOW LIFE HE NEEDS TO SEE HOW FAR OUR MONEY ACTUALLY GOES AND THE FACT IT GETS HARDER WHEN WE HAVE CHILDREN NOT EASIER. WE NEED TO SHOW HIM WHAT ITS LIKE WHEN YOU LIVE OF THE MINIMUM LIVING EXPENSES £159 A WEEK FOR FOUR PEOPLE AND THERE IS STILL BILLS IN THAT TO BE PAID. WE NEED TO MAKE HIM SEE FIRST HAND WHAT ITS LIKE HAVING BARLEY ANY MONEY IE, STUDENTS,SINGLE PARENTS, SICKNESS, THEIR USUALLY IS A REASON. SIGN OUR PETITION AND LETS SHOW TONY BLAIR THE TRUE MEANING OF STRAPPED FOR CASH.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters, they make the text very hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
